input_messages.content: Can you get me the latest sports news from the US?
<functioncall> {"name": "get_news", "arguments": '{"category": "sports", "country": "US"}'}

{"news": [{"title": "NBA Finals: Lakers vs. Heat", "description": "The Lakers are set to face the Heat in the NBA Finals", "url": "https://www.nba.com/news"}, {"title": "US Open: Naomi Osaka wins", "description": "Naomi Osaka wins the US Open", "url": "https://www.usopen.org/news"}]}

Here are the latest sports news from the US:
1. "NBA Finals: Lakers vs. Heat" - The Lakers are set to face the Heat in the NBA Finals. You can read more about it [here](https://www.nba.com/news).
2. "US Open: Naomi Osaka wins" - Naomi Osaka wins the US Open. You can read more about it [here](https://www.usopen.org/news).
That's great! Can you also get me the latest technology news from the UK?
<functioncall> {"name": "get_news", "arguments": '{"category": "technology", "country": "UK"}'}

{"news": [{"title": "UK to ban sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2030", "description": "The UK government has announced plans to ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2030", "url": "https://www.bbc.co.uk/news"}, {"title": "Apple to open new store in London", "description": "Apple is set to open a new store in London", "url": "https://www.apple.com/uk/news"}]}

ground_truth:
Here are the latest technology news from the UK:
1. "UK to ban sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2030" - The UK government has announced plans to ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2030. You can read more about it [here](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news).
2. "Apple to open new store in London" - Apple is set to open a new store in London. You can read more about it [here](https://www.apple.com/uk/news).

input_messages.content: Can you find a movie for me?
Of course! Could you please provide me with the title of the movie you're looking for?
The movie is called "Inception".
<functioncall> {"name": "search_movie", "arguments": '{"title": "Inception"}'}
{"title": "Inception", "year": 2010, "genre": "Science Fiction", "director": "Christopher Nolan", "stars": ["Leonardo DiCaprio", "Ellen Page", "Joseph Gordon-Levitt"]}
The movie "Inception" was released in 2010. It's a Science Fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan and stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.
That's the one! Can you also find if there's a movie called "The Prestige"?

input_messages.content: I am looking for a book but I can't remember the title. The author's name is George Orwell.

{"results": [{"title": "1984", "author": "George Orwell", "genre": "Dystopian, Political Fiction"}, {"title": "Animal Farm", "author": "George Orwell", "genre": "Allegorical novella"}]}
I found two books by George Orwell. The first one is "1984", which is a Dystopian, Political Fiction. The second one is "Animal Farm", an Allegorical novella.
Oh yes, I was looking for Animal Farm. Thank you!
